title: Cook With My Son
description: we prepared some raw fish and my son helped me in cooking, he is really fond of doing kitchen experiments

title: Breakfast with my wife
description: We had breakfast together , shared some talks and laughed

title: My wife mother got a paralysis attack
description: at around 12 in noon, my wife heard from her family living in pakistan that her mother got a paralysis attack and admitted to hostpital, she realy got worried, I tried to talk to her so she can get relaxed. I also called my in-laws to check the status in hospital, they said they will do CT scan and will update
